Posts.Content: Jun 12, 2008 09:26PM scaredmomasgirl wrote: Thank you both! After losing my Dad so long ago from this my Mom is all I have! I am also inthe middle of a divorce from an abusive relationship of 14 years.I guess I am on overload and can not seem to find the good in anything right now. I just do ot want to bring my mother down so I just kinda act like everything is ok in front of her and the kids. I am just feeling alone and scared. Thank you for your encouragement!
